meanings.definition: The act of making something more attractive or beautiful.
meanings.sent1: She spent hours on the prettifications of her garden, adding colorful flowers and decorations.
meanings.sent2: The prettifications of the room included elegant curtains and a sparkling chandelier.
meanings.sent3: The prettifications of the cake with extra frosting made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her prettifications of the plain dress transformed it into a glamorous gown.
meanings.sent5: The prettifications of the park with twinkling lights created a magical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Things that are done to make something more attractive or beautiful.
meanings.sent1: The prettifications in the garden, such as adding a fountain and colorful plants, made it a peaceful retreat.
meanings.sent2: She admired the prettifications in the room, from the stylish furniture to the beautiful paintings on the walls.
meanings.sent3: The prettifications on the cupcakes with sprinkles and frosting made them irresistible.
meanings.sent4: The prettifications on the old building with fresh paint and flowers brought new life to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: His prettifications on the car with shiny rims and a sleek design turned heads wherever he drove.
